sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  header.menu
    h1.logo fuuu hairmake
    nav.menu__nav
      li.menu__nav__link(v-for="item in nav")
        <router-link v-bind:to="item.path">{{ item.page }}</router-link>
    <slideImg></slideImg/>
</template>

<script>
import slideImg from "@/components/slideImg.vue"

export default {
  name:'fuuuHeader',
  components:{
    slideImg
  },
  computed: {
    nav(){return this.$store.getters.nav}
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
.menu{
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 25vw;
  height: 100%;
  background: #f5f5f5;
  padding:2rem 2rem 8rem;
  transition: .3s;
  flex-direction: column;
  @include flx(bet , top);
  flex-direction: column;
  &__nav{
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  &__nav__link{
    width: 5rem;
    height: 5rem;
    background: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 5rem;
    box-shadow: $shadow__02;
  }
  &__nav__link  + .menu__nav__link{
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }
}

.index .menu{
  width: 35vw;
}

</style>
